description:
Growl for Windows is a Windows-compatible version of Growl, a notification system for Mac OS X. Growl lets you know when things happen. Files finished downloading, friends came online, new email has arrived - Growl can let you know when any event occurs with a subtle notification. The rest of the time, Growl stays out of your way.
        | Please install with chocolatey (http://nuget.org/List/Packages/chocolatey).
summary: Growl for Windows is a Windows-compatible version of Growl, a notification system for Mac OS X.
author: Brian Dunnington
